content: When you return it to the Drunken Boar, he’ll thank you, and declare that he’s now off **in search of a meaty meal**. Speak to him again and he’ll mention hearing about rat carcasses located at the **Crouching Tiger Temple**. He doesn’t actually want you to get some for him, and will set off himself.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Drunken_Boar_Questline.md', within the main section titled 'Drunken Boar Questline', specifically from the subsection 'At the Crouching Tiger Temple'.
The content is as follows:
When you return it to the Drunken Boar, he’ll thank you, and declare that he’s now off **in search of a meaty meal**. Speak to him again and he’ll mention hearing about rat carcasses located at the **Crouching Tiger Temple**. He doesn’t actually want you to get some for him, and will set off himself.
